meanings.definition: A duplicating machine that uses a stencil to reproduce written material.
meanings.sent1: The cyclostyle in the office helps make copies of important documents.
meanings.sent2: The school purchased a new cyclostyle to duplicate worksheets for the students.
meanings.sent3: The cyclostyle at the library decided to take a break and refused to make any more copies.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a cyclostyle, effortlessly reproducing memories with precision.
meanings.sent5: The cyclostyle hummed softly as it diligently copied each page of the book.

meanings.definition: To reproduce written material using a duplicating machine.
meanings.sent1: She cyclostyles the flyers for the event to distribute to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The secretary cyclostyled the meeting agenda for all the attendees.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to cyclostyle its paw prints all over the freshly mopped floor.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to cyclostyle themselves in her mind, repeating over and over.
meanings.sent5: The artist cyclostyled the design onto the fabric, creating a unique pattern.
